subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Thanks
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Hiya

Hmmm you will have to tell me what the filename was it doesnt number them on my end. Like 031206h.jpg or whatever. I call him the sockpuppet guy because when I recieved it I thought that looked like a big sock puppet he was holding up LOL. 

But yes I used the webcam for those. I dont know why sometimes they are clear and sometimes they are more pixelated. Same as evp never know why its clearer some days than others.

Misty

--- On Tue, 7/22/08, newsurfer34 <newsurfer34@...> wrote:

> From: newsurfer34 <newsurfer34@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Thanks
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Tuesday, July 22, 2008, 1:07 PM
> Thanks for the welcome, Misty.  I saw your photo album on
> your 
> website.  Those are awesome caps.  Did you only use a
> webcam for 
> these?  Some of them came out so clearly.  I left a comment
> on one of 
> them. (031206h)  I think some of yours are more clear than
> some I have 
> seen using the camcorder and t.v. screen.  How did you get
> the dots on 
> number 44?  Is there a way to focus in better?
